meanings.definition: A person who has authority over other administrators.
meanings.sent1: The superadministrators at the school make important decisions for the staff.
meanings.sent2: The superadministrators met to discuss the budget for the upcoming year.
meanings.sent3: The superadministrators decided to have a pizza party for the staff on Friday.
meanings.sent4: The superadministrators were like the captains of a ship, guiding the rest of the crew.
meanings.sent5: The superadministrators were respected and admired by all the other administrators.

meanings.definition: The highest-ranking administrators in an organization.
meanings.sent1: During the meeting, the superadministrators outlined the new company policies.
meanings.sent2: The superadministrators were responsible for overseeing all departments within the organization.
meanings.sent3: The superadministrators wore matching hats to show their unity.
meanings.sent4: The superadministrators were like the kings and queens of the organization's hierarchy.
meanings.sent5: The superadministrators had offices on the top floor of the building, overseeing everything below.
